TextModeration.summary: Provides moderation services for multiple business scenarios and identifies various violation risks.

schema.description: The type of the moderation service.
The parameters required by the moderation service. The value is a JSON string.

reason.description: The JSON string used to locate the cause.

accountId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

TextModeration.title: TextModeration

TextModerationPlus.summary: Moderates the input command and generated text of large language models (LLMs). Specific model input commands can be used to retrieve standard answers. The feature of enabling and disabling the moderation labels is also available.

schema.description:
The moderation service.

Valid values:

*   chat_detection_pro: moderation of interactive content of private chats_Professional
*   llm_response_moderation: moderation of text generated by LLMs
*   llm_query_moderation: moderation of input text of LLMs
*   nickname_detection_pro: moderation of user nicknames_Professional
*   comment_detection_pro: moderation of comment content of public chats_Professional
The parameters required by the moderation service. The value is a JSON string.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: The returned HTTP status code. The status code 200 indicates that the request was successful.

Message.description: The message that is returned in response to the request.

Confidence.description: The score of the confidence level. Valid values: 0 to 100. The value is accurate to two decimal places.

RiskWords.description: The term hit by the moderated content.

CustomizedHit.description: The custom term hit by the moderated content.

KeyWords.description: The terms that are hit. Multiple terms are separated by commas (,).

TextModerationPlus.title: TextModerationPlus
TextModerationPlus.description: Before you call this operation, make sure that you have [activated the Content Moderation 2.0 service](https://common-buy.aliyun.com/?commodityCode=lvwang_cip_public_cn) and are familiar with the [billing](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/2671445.html?#section-6od-32j-99n) of the Text Moderation 2.0 Plus service.

ImageModeration.summary: Identifies whether an image contains content or elements that violate relevant regulations on network content dissemination, affect the content order of a specific platform, or affect user experience. Image Moderation 2.0 supports over 90 content risk labels and over 100 risk control items. Image Moderation 2.0 of Content Moderation allows you to develop further moderation or governance measures for specific image content based on business scenarios, platform-specific content governance rules, or rich risk labels and scores of confidence levels returned by API calls.

schema.description:
The moderation services supported by Image Moderation 2.0. Valid values:

*   baselineCheck: common baseline moderation
*   baselineCheck_pro: common baseline moderation_Professional
*   baselineCheck_cb: common baseline moderation_For regions outside the Chinese mainland
*   tonalityImprove: content governance moderation
*   aigcCheck: AI-generated image identification
*   profilePhotoCheck: avatar image moderation
*   advertisingCheck: marketing material identification
*   liveStreamCheck: moderation of screenshots of videos and live streams

Valid values:

*   liveStreamCheck: moderation of screenshots of videos and live streams
*   baselineCheck: common baseline moderation
*   aigcCheck: AI-generated image identification
*   baselineCheck_pro: common baseline moderation_Professional
*   advertisingCheck: marketing material identification
*   baselineCheck_cb: common baseline moderation_For regions outside the Chinese mainland
*   tonalityImprove: content governance moderation
*   profilePhotoCheck: avatar image moderation

The parameters required by the moderation service. The value is a JSON string.

*   imageUrl: the URL of the object that you want to moderate. This parameter is required.
*   dataId: the ID of the object that you want to moderate. This parameter is optional.
The response parameters.

RequestId.description: The request ID, which is used to locate and troubleshoot issues.

Code.description: The returned HTTP status code. The status code 200 indicates that the request was successful.

Msg.description: The message that is returned in response to the request.

DataId.description:
The ID of the moderated object.

>  If you specify the dataId parameter in the request, the value of the dataId parameter is returned in the response.

Result.description: The results of image moderation parameters such as the label parameter and the confidence parameter, which are an array structure.

Label.description: The labels returned after the image moderation. Multiple risk labels and the corresponding scores of confidence levels may be returned for an image.

Confidence.description: The score of the confidence level. Valid values: 0 to 100. The value is accurate to two decimal places. Some labels do not have scores of confidence levels.
The score of the confidence level. Valid values: 0 to 100. The value is accurate to two decimal places. Some labels do not have scores of confidence levels.

OcrResult.description: Returns the text information in the recognized image.

Text.description: The text information in the recognized image.

X.description: The distance between the upper-left corner of the text area and the y-axis, using the upper-left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

Y.description: The distance between the upper left corner of the text area and the x-axis, with the upper left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

W.description: The width of the text area, in pixels.

H.description: The height of the text area, in pixels.

TextInImage.description: Returns the text information in the hit image.

OcrResult.description: Returns the text information in the recognized image.

Text.description: The text information in the recognized image.

X.description: The distance between the upper-left corner of the text area and the y-axis, using the upper-left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

Y.description: The distance between the upper left corner of the text area and the x-axis, with the upper left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

H.description: The height of the text area, in pixels.

W.description: The width of the text area, in pixels.

RiskWord.description: The risk words that are hit. Multiple words are separated by commas (,).

items.description: The risk words that are hit. Multiple words are separated by commas (,).

CustomText.description: When a custom text library is hit, the custom library ID, custom library name, and custom word are returned.

KeyWords.description: Custom words, multiple words separated by commas.

CustomImage.description: If a custom image library is hit, information about the hit custom image library is returned.

Location.description: the data array of location info

X.description: The distance between the upper-left corner of the text area and the y-axis, using the upper-left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

Y.description: The distance between the upper left corner of the text area and the x-axis, with the upper left corner of the image as the coordinate origin, in pixels.

W.description: The width of the text area, in pixels.

H.description: The height of the text area, in pixels.

Confidence.description: The score of the confidence level. Valid values: 0 to 100. The value is accurate to two decimal places. Some labels do not have scores of confidence levels.

Bang.description: Indicates whether the recognition result of bangs is available.

Value.description: Indicates whether the recognition result of bangs is available.

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the bang recognition result. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

Value.description:
The gender recognition result. Valid values:

- Male

- FeMale

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the gender recognition result. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

Glasses.description:
The recognition result of whether to wear glasses.

- None: No glasses.

- Wear: Wear glasses.

- Sunglass: Wear sunglasses.

Value.description:
The hairstyle recognition result. Valid values:

- Bald: bald head.

- Long: Long hair.

- Short: Short hair.

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the hairstyle recognition result. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

Hat.description: The recognition result of whether to wear a hat.

Value.description:
The recognition result of whether to wear the hat. Valid values:

- Wear: Wear a hat.

- None: No hat.

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the result of wearing the hat. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

X.description: The distance from the upper-left corner of the face area to the y-axis with the upper-left corner of the image as the coordinate origin. Unit: pixels.

Y.description: The distance from the upper-left corner of the face area to the x-axis with the upper-left corner of the image as the coordinate origin. Unit: pixels.

W.description: The width of the face area. Unit: pixels.

H.description: The height of the face area. Unit: pixels.

Mask.description: The recognition result of whether to wear a mask.

Value.description:
The recognition result of whether to wear a mask. Valid values:

- Wear a mask.

 - None: No mask.

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the result of wearing the mask. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

Mustache.description: The identification result of whether there is a beard.

Value.description:
The identification result of whether there is a beard.Valid values:

- Has:have a beard.

- None:No beard.

Confidence.description: The confidence level of the result of the beard. Valid values: 0 to 100. A higher value indicates a more credible result.

Quality.description: The quality information of the face image.

Blur.description:
The blur of the face image. Valid values: 0 to 100. The higher the score, the more fuzzy it is.
Recommended values: 0 to 25.

Integrity.description: The integrity of the human face. Recommended values:80 to 100.

Pitch.description:
The head-up or head-down angle of the face.
Recommended values:-30 to 30.

Roll.description:
The plane rotation angle of the face.
Recommended values:-30 to 30.

Yaw.description:
The left and right shaking angle of the human face.
Recommended values:-30 to 30.

Smile.description: The smiling degree of the face.

ImageModeration.title: ImageModeration
ImageModeration.description: **Before you call this operation, make sure that you are familiar with the [billing](~~467826~~)[](https://www.aliyun.com/price/product?#/lvwang/detail/cdibag) of Image Moderation 2.0.

ImageAsyncModeration.summary: Moderates images in asynchronous mode. An asynchronous image moderation task does not return the moderation results in real time. To obtain moderation results, you can poll the moderation results periodically or enable callback notification. The moderation results are retained for a maximum of 3 days.

schema.description: The type of the moderation service.
The parameters required by the moderation service. The value is a JSON string.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Msg.description: The message that is returned in response to the request.

ReqId.description: The reqId field returned by the Image Async Moderation API. You can use this field to query the detection results.

DataId.description: The ID of the moderated object.

DescribeImageModerationResult.title: DescribeImageModerationResult
DescribeImageModerationResult.description:
*   Billing: This operation is free of charge.
*   QPS limit: You can call this operation up to 100 times per second per account. If the number of the calls per second exceeds the limit, throttling is triggered. As a result, your business may be affected. We recommend that you take note of the limit when you call this operation.
DescribeImageModerationResult.responseParamsDescription:
The following table describes the response codes. You are charged by using the pay-as-you-go billing method only for requests whose response code is 200.

|**Code**|**Description**|
|---|---|
|200|The request is successful.|
|280|The moderation is in progress.|
|400|Not all request parameters are configured.|
|401|The values specified for one or more request parameters are invalid.|
|402|Invalid request parameters. Check and modify them and try again.|
|403|The QPS of requests exceeds the upper limit. Check and modify the number of requests that are sent at a time.|
|404|The specified image failed to be downloaded. Check the URL of the image or try again.|
|405|Downloading the specified image timed out. The possible cause is that the image cannot be accessed. Check and adjust the image and try again.|
|406|The specified image is excessively large. Check and change the image size and try again.|
|407|The format of the specified image is not supported. Check and change the image format and try again.|
|408|You do not have the required permissions. The possible cause is that this account is not activated, has overdue payments, or is not authorized to call this API.|
|409|The specified request ID does not exist. The possible cause is that the query is performed too fast or the moderation results have exceeded the 30-day validity period.|
|500|A system exception occurred.|

schema.description: The type of the moderation service. Valid values: nickname_detection: user nickname

The parameters of API requests that are sent from API Gateway to the backend service.

For more information, see [ServiceParameter](~~43988~~).

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Message.description: The message that is returned in response to the request.

Url.description: The URL of the moderated content.

LiveId.description: The unique ID of the live stream.

SliceDetails.description: The moderation results of audio segments.

items.description: The moderation results of the audio segment.

StartTime.description: The start time of the audio segment in seconds.

EndTime.description: The end time of the audio segment in seconds.

StartTimestamp.description: The start timestamp of the segment. Unit: milliseconds.

EndTimestamp.description: The end timestamp of the segment. Unit: milliseconds.

Url.description: The temporary URL of the audio segment.

Text.description: The text converted from the audio segment.

Score.description: The risk score. Default range: 0 to 99.

RiskTips.description: The details of the risky content.

RiskWords.description: The term hit by the risky content.

DataId.description: The ID of the moderated object.

VideoModeration.title: VideoModeration

VideoModerationResult.summary: Obtains the moderation results of a Video Moderation 2.0 task

schema.description:
The type of the moderation service.

Valid values:

*   liveStreamDetection: live stream moderation
*   videoDetection: video file moderation
*   liveStreamDetection_cb: live stream moderation_For regions outside the Chinese mainland
*   videoDetection_cb: video file moderation_For regions outside the Chinese mainland.
The parameters required by the moderation service. The ID of the task that you want to query. You can specify one task ID at a time.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: The returned HTTP status code. The status code 200 indicates that the request was successful.

Message.description: The message that is returned in response to the request.

LiveId.description: The unique ID of the live stream.

DataId.description: The value of dataId that is specified in the API request. If this parameter is not specified in the API request, the dataId field is not available in the response.

AudioResult.description: The voice moderation results. The moderation results contain a structure.

SliceDetails.description: The details about the text in the moderated voice. The value is a JSON array that contains one or more elements. Each element corresponds to a text entry.

StartTime.description: The start time of the text after voice-to-text conversion. Unit: seconds.

EndTime.description: The end time of the text after voice-to-text conversion. Unit: seconds.

StartTimestamp.description: The start timestamp of the segment. Unit: milliseconds.

EndTimestamp.description: The end timestamp of the segment. Unit: milliseconds.

Url.description: If the moderation object is a voice stream, this parameter indicates the temporary access URL of the voice stream to which the text entry corresponds. The validity period of the URL is 30 minutes. You must prepare another URL to store the voice stream at the earliest opportunity.

Score.description: The risk score. Default range: 0 to 99.

RiskTips.description: Subcategory labels. Multiple labels are separated by commas (,).

RiskWords.description: The risk words that are hit. Multiple words are separated by commas (,).

LabelSum.description: The number of times that the label is matched.

FrameResult.description: The image moderation results. If the call is successful, the HTTP status code 200 and moderation results are returned. The moderation results contain a structure.

FrameNum.description: The number of captured frames that are returned for the video file.

Frames.description: The information about the frames that match the labels.

TempUrl.description: The temporary URL of a captured frame.

Offset.description: The interval between the start of the video file and the captured frame. Unit: seconds.

Results.description: The results of frame moderation parameters such as the label parameter and the confidence parameter.

Service.description: The moderation service that is called.

Result.description: The results of frame moderation parameters such as the label parameter and the confidence parameter.

Confidence.description: The score of the confidence level. Valid values: 0 to 100. The value is accurate to two decimal places.

Label.description: The label returned after a frame is moderated. Multiple risk labels and the corresponding scores of confidence levels may be returned for a frame.

TextInImage.description: The information about the text hit in the image is returned.

CustomImage.description: If a custom image library is hit, information about the custom image library is returned.

LibId.description: The ID of the custom image library that is hit.

ImageId.description: The ID of the custom image that is hit.

PublicFigure.description: If the video contains a specific figure, the code of the identified figure is returned.

FigureId.description: The information about the code of the identified figure.

FrameSummarys.description: The summary of the labels against which captured frames are matched.

Label.description: The label against which a captured frame is matched.

LabelSum.description: The number of times that the label is matched.

VideoModerationResult.description: This operation is free of charge. We recommend that you query moderation results at least 30 seconds after you send an asynchronous moderation request. Content Moderation retains moderation results for at most 24 hours. After 24 hours, the results are deleted.

DescribeUrlModerationResult.title: DescribeUrlModerationResult
DescribeUrlModerationResult.description:
*   Billing: This operation is free of charge.
*   Query timeout: We recommend that you query moderation results at least 480 seconds after you send an asynchronous moderation request. Content Moderation retains moderation results for up to 3 days. After 3 days, the results are deleted.
*   You can call this operation up to 100 times per second per account. If the number of the calls per second exceeds the limit, throttling is triggered. As a result, your business may be affected. We recommend that you take note of the limit when you call this operation.
